name: The Dalí Museum & Girona Tour
description: Experience the high-speed 300 km/h train journey to Figueres and discover the truth behind Dalí's famous quote "The difference between a madman and me is that I am not mad". The Dalí Museum will reveal the secrets from conscious-unconscious going beyond the obvious. Do not miss Girona, a jewel of culture and history, with medieval and Jewish quarters and the colourful houses on the Onyar river.
